title: Stalker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Stalk a target at night, surveying them and all of their visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn the role of everyone you survey.
- You will not learn who visited your target; you will only receive a list of roles that visited your target.
- All Coven attacks against surveyed targets are one level higher, however this doesn't apply the same night you survey them.
- You are Astral.
- With the Necronomicon, you can use a Basic attack on someone each night. You will additionally automatically stalk whoever receives the most visits that night, randomized if it's a tie.
